features: PREMIUM MATERIAL FOR SUPER RAZOR SHARP BLADE - This 5 inch hand forged boning knife is made from premium 7Cr17MoV high carbon stainless steel, hardness up to 55+ HRC, is a premium japan kitchen husk knife comparing to most of others. Super sharp and durable, which ensures ultra sharp cutting. No dishwasher, and make sure its clean & dry to resist rust after each use, it will last a much long time.

ERGONOMIC FULL TANG HANDLE FOR COMFORTABLE GRIP - this handmade viking knife's curved handle is made of high-quality wenge wood, with large finger hole which enhances this chef knife stury and durability. You'll use this japanese kitchen knife with comfortable grip for excellent control, won't feel tired for using a long time, you will find it's impossible to ever go back to your typical meat cleaver knife for meat cutting.

PORTABLE LEATHER SHEATH - A professional leather sheath comes with this ourdoor chef knife, it will profects your butcher knife perfectly, and also convenient to carry when you wear it on your belt. Not only for home kitchen cook, also a good choice for outdoor hunting / deer meat processing, camping, bbq knife, it will work perfectly.

MULTIPURPOSE KITCHEN KNIFE - This handmade forged kitchen knife meets all the chef's requirements of knives. No matter it's boning trimming brisket, leg of lamb, separating ribs from pork loin, meat cutting, slicing, skinning or chopping, mincing and dicing fruits / vegetables, it will perform very well.

GIFT BOX PACKING - Our professional kitchen knife is well packaged in an gift box, which is perfect as a gift to parents, chef, friends on special days like Mother's Day, Father's Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas, New Year, Birthday, etc. Owning AllynX handmade boning knives will allow you to butcher meat at home, enjoy the joyment of precious cutting! If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us and we will response within 8 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: YOU DESERVE A GOOD OUTDOOR KNIFE When you're hunting a deer, having your fresh chicken, seafood, or meat processing for your favorite recipes, you will know how important a good and sharp boning knife is. AllynX hand forged boning knife that features razor sharp edge, outstanding edge retention, and elegant Easten aesthetics is made of high-quality carbon steel, gets top marks for its comfortable hand feel and balance, its sharp, long-lasting edge, and excellent maneuverability. Professional chefs tend to use their chef knife cleaver upwards of 40 hours a week, while home chefs typically use them for about 20 minutes a day for meat cutting and processing to prepare dinner. To have a suitable meat cleaver/butcher knife among your kitchen cutlery would be the most important thing for every chef. AllynX chef's knives are coveted for their beautiful and detailed design as well as the cuts they produce. From heating and hammering the metal, to sharpening the chefs knife's edge and polishing the final blade, AllynX has chosen to use the best metals available in Western and combime with Eastern traditional masters, to create this art kitchen knife.

TO ACHIEVE MORE PRECIOUS AND SHARP CUTTING With the prevalence of TV shows like MasterChef and the Great British Menu, people are increasingly eager to try the rarer parts of an animal, like the neck, cheek, feet or some of the more unusual organs. You have more control over what you cook. This is one way to get the exact cut you’re after, be it thick, thin, fatty or lean. What does AllynX do to achieve more precious and sharp cutting with its kitchen knife? -The stamped blade is constructed of high-carbon steel, through ice-tempered, hand sharpened and boned to 55 HRC for durability and toughness. -Hand forging creates the distinctive Tsuchime finish of blade of this butcher knife– striking in appearance, forging also has a functional practicality as it creates small air pockets to prevent foods from sticking, and allows morsels to be gently pushed from the blade. -The hand-sharpened edge reduces drag for fatigue-free use, and excels at slicing tasks such as trimming away fat and silver skin.

LET'S GO FUTHER TOGETHER The AllynX butcher knives are high-end products, good companion for any home or professional cook, or even the avid outdoorsman. The members of AllynX have the pursuit of beautiful design, premium quality kitchen chefs knife, our mission is to inspire and drive creativity across the globe, to let more family to enjoy the experience of wonderful cooking process. AllynX team would never be satisfied with current products and quality service. We will not stop, we believe our spirit of exploring and adventuring will drive us go further.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Seems sturdy and well crafted. Comfortable to use and very aesthetically pleasing. Meds a little bit of sharpening but seems a great quality knife. Worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves it so far. Extremely sharp. Only had for a short time, so can't say on how long the blade lasts before needing sharpened. But so far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful camping cutlery.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect knife. Used it while canoeing / camping. Slices vegetables, meat, etc. very well. Cleaned it on sand in the river. Stayed sharp. Very cool to look at and well made to boot. Looks awesome, but is actually very functional. Heavy, but well balanced. Will adore this for the rest of my life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little lighter than I expected
reviews.reviewText: This knife is a bit lighter in weight than I had expected, but is full-tang and solidly constructed. Maybe lighter weight will enable a bit of flex at the tip, which would be beneficial in a boning knife.I'll likely be using it primarily for "small work" in camp cooking (with a serbian knife for "big work"), and don't know if much boning will be involved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good knife, poor quality sheath.
reviews.reviewText: My sister hit a deer Tuesday with her car and asked if I wanted it. The knife worked great, but the sheath didn't hold up well. The upper stap for the handle didn't make it out of the ditch. I'm not sure when it fell off somewhere between taking the knife out and putting it back in.As you can see by the picture, the strap for the blade won't last much longer, certainly not another trip in the field.TL:DRVery pleased with the knife, but sheath is poor quality. For the price point, I'm still very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great knife for what you pay🤷🏽‍♂️
reviews.reviewText: Pretty cheap price, but cuts like an expensive one. I didn't think much of it when I ordered it, was more a "just try it" situation, but I'm impressed. Very sharp, stylish knife. Even used it to carve the New Years Eve prime rib. ONLY thing I didn't care for was the holster quality, but, it's about the knife, not what holds it. Holds very well in the hand for a "uni-hand" handle. Awesome job🤙🏽(it wouldn't let me add a photo of the meal, sorry)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice feeling knives
reviews.reviewText: The knives were gifted for x-mass.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was appreciated by the receiver. Really liked the knife.
Hallo, war stolz wie Bolle und hatte viel vor mit dem Messer als Hobbysmoker , leider ist die Klinge defekt. 😢 Wie bzw. wer schleift mir das Messer, schade hat nicht lange gehalten. Viele Grüße Frank
